note.p: Physician. LSA 1830; member of the Royal College of Surgeons of England, 1832; LRCP London, 1849. Member of the British Association for the Advancment of Science. Physician at a hydropathic establishment, in Southport. Published on a wide range of medical topics.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/3874/111/22)
